data.title: Curzon Cinema & Arts
data.meta_description: “Few pictures can match the glamorous pull of Dreamgirls. Bill Condon’s first big musical since Chicago is a glossy, gleaming Cadillac of a film with…
data.text:
“Few pictures can match the glamorous pull of Dreamgirls. Bill Condon’s first big musical since Chicago is a glossy, gleaming Cadillac of a film with a vintage rhythm and blues engine tuned to perfection…the cast is dressed to kill.” – The Times

Our first music extravaganza of Season 2 is a toe-tapping Motown roller-coaster ride with a host of added extras that are worth dressing in your ‘70s soulful best for. Disco balls at the ready, we are welcoming back Able Mabel for free hair-styling, candy-floss a go-go an a cinema alive with the talents of the Dreamettes wannabes.
